Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controller

Class CollisionController

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controller.CollisionController
public class CollisionController
extends java.lang.Object
General collision controller Used for collision with enemy Used for collision with explosion Used for collision with game items
